job.name: TpcRS
job.command: source ~/.tcshrc cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} # starver .DEV2 # setup gcc451 setup 32b set evtsFile = $INPUTFILE0; set file = `basename $evtsFile .MuDst` echo "${evtsFile}" if (! -r ${evtsFile}) exit 1; set logFile = ${file}B.log set f=`find . -maxdepth 1 -type f -name "${file}*.root"` if ("$f" == "") then root4star -q -b 'TpcRS.C(100,"mc.y2010,TpcRS","'${evtsFile}'","Bichsel,PhysicsOff")' >& ${logFile} endif
